original_title: Fiddlin Man: The Life and Times of Bob Wills
overview: Legendary western swing band leader Bob Wills rose up in the Great Depression to fame in Oklahoma and Texas that soon swept the entire nation. The documentary FIDDLIN MAN offers a full biography of Wills, using a vast array of on camera interviews with his friends, family, and fellow musicians. The film also draws on a wealth of rare archival footage.
title: Fiddlin Man: The Life and Times of Bob Wills
